<h3 id="X31776">X(31776) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ANTI-CIRCUMPERP-TANGENTIAL AND INCIRCLE-CIRCLES</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4+(b+c)*a^3-2*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31776) = 3*X(354)+X(10483) = 3*X(942)-X(10572) = X(1770)+3*X(5434) = X(3555)+3*X(17579) = 3*X(4292)+X(10106) = 4*X(4298)-X(31795) = 3*X(5049)-X(6284) = 3*X(5434)-X(9957) = 3*X(7354)+X(10572) = X(10106)-3*X(18990) = 3*X(11227)-X(11827)</b>
<p>X(31776) lies on these lines:
{1,1657}, {3,5290}, {7,18481}, {12,5122}, {30,4298}, {46,9657}, {56,9955}, {57,9655}, {65,28204}, {79,1319}, {226,13624}, {354,10483}, {381,3361}, {382,3333}, {388,3579}, {495,31663}, {515,24470}, {516,31792}, {517,4292}, {535,3812}, {548,13405}, {549,3947}, {550,21620}, {553,28208}, {942,7354}, {950,28168}, {993,3824}, {999,9579}, {1155,5270}, {1385,3485}, {1478,9956}, {1482,4312}, {1770,5434}, {1836,4317}, {2098,4338}, {2646,4325}, {2829,5806}, {3303,4333}, {3338,12943}, {3339,18525}, {3476,11278}, {3529,11037}, {3555,17579}, {3600,12699}, {3627,11019}, {3649,21578}, {3656,4308}, {3748,4324}, {3884,28534}, {3982,16137}, {4295,24680}, {4297,6147}, {4299,10404}, {4311,15178}, {4314,15704}, {4315,22791}, {4355,15934}, {5049,6284}, {5126,12047}, {5563,7743}, {5691,5708}, {5882,30424}, {6738,28186}, {6744,28172}, {9612,11230}, {9654,11231}, {10578,17538}, {10624,28202}, {11011,11552}, {11227,11827}, {11374,17502}, {12433,28164}, {12575,28178}, {12577,15172}, {13407,15326}, {13462,18493}, {15171,28154}, {17563,21075}, {18421,18526}, {22753,22792}, {31409,31430}, {31434,31447}</p>
<p>
X(31776) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {942, 7354}, {1770, 9957}, {4292, 18990}<br>
X(31776) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5045, 4298), (15172, 12577), (31794, 24470), (31795, 5045)<br>
X(31776) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (57, 9655, 18480), (382, 3333, 18527)<br>
</p>
